name: 社長
text: お前、担当アイドルのことをどう思っている？
trans: So, what do you think of the idol you're responsible for?

name: プロデューサー
text: ……たしかに負けてしまいましたけど、\n彼女こそが最高のアイドルだと思っています
trans: ...It's true that we failed, but I still personally believe she's incredible. That she stands as one of the greatest idols out there.

name: はづき
text: ふふ\n社長が聞きたかった言葉、そのまま出てきましたね
trans: Eheh. You told the president exactly what he was hoping to hear.

name: はづき
text: もし違う言葉が出てきたら、\n説教してやるって言って聞かなかったのに
trans: If you said anything else, he had quite the lecture prepared for you.

name: 社長
text: ……うるさいぞ。とにかく、\nそういうことなら私から言うことはない
trans: ...Shut up. Anyway, in that case, there's nothing I need to say to you.

name: 社長
text: さあ、早くその最高のアイドルに\n会いに行ってこい
trans: What you need to do now is go and meet with that incredible idol of yours.

name: プロデューサー
trans:
...We were so close.
I'm so... frustrated.

name: 透
trans:
...say.
Do you think being frustrated is... something happy?

name: プロデューサー
text: ──ん？　悔しいは……\n悔しいことなんじゃないか？
trans:
──huh? Being frustrated...
That's all it is, isn't it? Frustrating?

name: 透
text: でも、のぼってて増えるのは、\n嬉しいことなんでしょ
trans:
But there being so much more to climb,
isn't that a happy thing?
